backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining user profiles, category enum, permissions, and CRUD operations with storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old profile level data into the new 7‑category format and mapping stored profiles to the updated structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files and components related to category migration and UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps to deploy PlayPal to Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, PWA settings, icons, and script bootstrap for the frontend app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, start URL, and icon assets.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache versioning, cleanup, and network-first fetch strategy.
frontend/scripts/mainnet-redeploy.sh: Shell script automating clean install, type check, build, and mainnet deployment via dfx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry that handles authentication, profile loading, and routes users to login, profile setup, or the main app shell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Navigation shell managing screen switching between Discover, Profile, and Settings with a bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBadge.ts: Renders a styled badge displaying a category label.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Displays a detailed profile card with photo, category, position, zone, stats, and availability.
Filter component allowing users to select min/max category and geographic zone.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles photo uploads with validation, progress tracking, and integration with the upload mutation.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user’s photo or a fallback icon with styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and logic using Internet Identity, including login and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profile actions, photo upload, and discovery filtering via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes plus base body and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: Renders swipe-style candidate discovery with filters, card stack, and like/pass actions.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form to edit user profile fields and submit updates via useUpdateProfile.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays login UI using Internet Identity with branding and gradient background.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Shows the logged‑in user's profile with stats and allows switching to edit mode.
Form for creating a new user profile with category, position, zone, and bio fields.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings UI with logout confirmation and app info; clears identity and query cache on logout.
frontend/src/utils/discoverFilterMapping: Exports category filter options mapping backend enum values to Spanish labels 1era–7ma.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Provides functions to map Category and Position enums to their Spanish labels.
frontend/src/utils/unreadMessagesStore.t: Empty placeholder for unread messages state handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/uruguayDepartments.ts: Exports the list of Uruguay departments and a constant for selecting all departments.
frontend/src/utils/zoneFilterMappings.ts: Empty placeholder for zone filter mappings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended colors, radii, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking category selector migration and related feature requests.
